PurchaseApply_ID, FCustomer, RelationNum, BusinessType, DataSources, FNum, FOrderer, FExplanation, ApplyPerson, FMakeBillsPersoID, FMakeBillsTime, FCheckPersonID, FCheckTime, FCheckFlag, SalesOrder_ID, MaterialID, PlanningWorkOrder_ID
mapper.update:
update
set FCustomer = #{FCustomer}, BusinessType = #{BusinessType}, FNum = #{FNum}, FOrderer = #{FOrderer}, FExplanation = #{FExplanation}, ApplyPerson = #{ApplyPerson}, SalesOrder_ID = #{SalesOrder_ID}, MaterialID = #{MaterialID}, PlanningWorkOrder_ID = #{PlanningWorkOrder_ID} where PurchaseApply_ID = #{PurchaseApply_ID}
mapper.select: select , isnull(f2.FName,'无名称') +'/'+isnull(f2.FNum,'无编号') FCustomerJoint, f3.NAME FOrdererName, f4.NAME ApplyPersonName, f5.NAME FMakeBillsPersoIDName, f6.NAME FCheckPersonIDName, f7.OrderNum OrderNum, f8.WorkOrderNum WorkOrderNum, f9.MAT_NAME MAT_NAME from f left join KM_Customer f2 on f.FCustomer=f2.Customer_ID left join OA_STAFF f3 on f.FOrderer=f3.STAFF_ID left join OA_STAFF f4 on f.ApplyPerson=f4.STAFF_ID left join OA_STAFF f5 on f.FMakeBillsPersoID=f5.STAFF_ID left join OA_STAFF f6 on f.FCheckPersonID=f6.STAFF_ID left join PP_SalesOrder f7 on f.SalesOrder_ID = f7.SalesOrder_ID left join PP_PlanningWorkOrder f8 on f.PlanningWorkOrder_ID = f8.PlanningWorkOrder_ID left join MBASE_MAT_BASIC f9 on f.MaterialID = f9.MAT_BASIC_ID where f.PurchaseApply_ID = #{PurchaseApply_ID}

select isnull(count(*),0) RepeatNum from f where 1=1 and FNum=#{FNum}
and f.PurchaseApply_ID != #{PurchaseApply_ID}

choose.when:
update
set FCheckTime = #{FCheckTime}, FCheckPersonID = #{FCheckPersonID}, FCheckFlag = #{FCheckFlag} where PurchaseApply_ID = #{PurchaseApply_ID}

update
set FCheckTime = '', FCheckPersonID = '', FCheckFlag = #{FCheckFlag} where PurchaseApply_ID = #{PurchaseApply_ID}
